data.title: Connect iPad and your computer with a cable
data.meta_description: Directly connect iPad and a Mac or PC to charge iPad, sync content, and more.
data.text:
You can use a cable to directly connect your iPad to a Mac with OS X 10.9 or later, or to a PC with Windows 7 or later.

Using the charging cable for your iPad, connect iPad to the USB port on your computer. If the cable isn’t compatible with the port on your computer, you’ll need to use an adapter (sold separately).

The iPad battery charges when iPad is connected to your computer and your computer is connected to power.
